General.Name: Eastern Commercial Leasing Public Company Limited
General.Description: Eastern Commercial Leasing Public Company Limited engages in the provision of credit services to personal and juristic person in the form of hire purchase, loans, and sale with right of redemption agreement in Thailand. It also provides vehicle registration, vehicle insurance, vehicle third party liability insurance, and life insurance renewal services. Eastern Commercial Leasing Public Company Limited was founded in 1982 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

3.Name: Mr. Sukkasem  Titasaro
3.Title: Collection & Litigation Director and Head of Compliance
